main event: A report of a large, stationary object observed in the sky near Waverly, Illinois on September 1, 1957.
interesting points: The object was larger than an airplane and had a white and green color with fuzzy edges., The object produced no sound and left no trail., Observation lasted approximately 20 minutes., There were 15 other witnesses to the same object., Various possible explanations were noted, including balloon or aircraft.
sighted object: a large white and green object in the sky
